features: Waterfront location next to Orientkaj Metro

demographics.growth_trend: Rapid expansion (grew from ~350 to ~560 employees between 2020-2023)
demographics.structure: Flat and informal structure with dynamic sub-teams

core_values: Focus on professional and personal development
cultural_DNA.diversity_focus: Strategic objective to have DE&I at all levels; established a Diversity Council
cultural_DNA.art_focus: Office houses a versatile art collection designed to interact with the architecture

catering_on_site.focus: Ecology, fresh products, meals cooked from scratch

transport.metro: Orientkaj Station (M4) is directly opposite the entrance
transport.cycling: Dedicated bicycle parking in underground facility
transport.parking: Private underground car park with guest spots

verified_event_traditions.bi_annual_trip: Company-wide trip abroad every 2 years (verified destinations: Marbella, Greece, Italy)
verified_event_traditions.weekly_social: Friday bar in their own on-site bar 'Barracuda'
verified_event_traditions.sports: Active football team (winners of the Danish attorney football tournament)

upcoming_context.strategic_focus: Retaining talent during rapid growth; integrating new hires
